ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wow...
ygData.msgSnippet: No way to fix it.  Egroups made the change.  You can pay to have it not appear, but I don t know anyone who has gone that route yet. btw  The main thing you
ygData.messageBody:
No way to fix it. Egroups made the change. You can pay to have it not
appear, but I don't know anyone who has gone that route yet.

btw The main thing you missed was the huge uproar over Verant's claim that
Lullaby was just fine. Many bards have left for other lands and I shall
soon be following. Even Lyrnia has retired which suprised me greatly. If
even Verant's staunchest supporters are outraged then things are worse than
I imagined.

Glad you had fun in Dalnir's Tani, be well.

Kit
-----------------------------------------------------------_->

Ok and hmm replying to my own message, all of a sudden the sponsor stuff is
at the top of my emails. Is this a change or is it cuz i upgraded to
Outlook 2000? If its the latter, anyone know how to fix it?
